Top Hotel Collections Resorts Villas 5 Star Hotels Near Airport View All Hotels In Hyderabad Beaches Near Hyderabad If you're looking for a coastal retreat from the booming city life, the beaches near Hyderabad are quite delightful, showcasing the divine beauty of the Coromandel Coast. With the scenic Vishakapatna (Read More)m close by, one can choose from an array of beaches like Rishikonda, Dolphin's Nose and Gangavaram. The port town of Machelipatnam is also host to a number of serene and slightly uncrowded coastal delights. Here is the list of 14 Beaches Near Hyderabad For A Sandy Getaway 1. Chirala Beach Also known as “Ksheerapuri”, the peaceful town of Chirala is located in the Prakasam district of Andhra Pradesh. The beaches of Chirala are untouched by human malice and over-population. Two prime beaches of the town include Ramapuram Beach and Vodarevu Beach. These beaches are ideal for relaxing and walking. Distance from Hyderabad: 307 km Read More 2. Suryalanka Beach, Guntur Suryalanka Beach near Hyderabad is a popular beach for family vacations. The beach is famous for the sweeping views of the sun, sea and sand. It is also ideal for swimming. It is also popular for dolphin spotting during November-December. Distance from Hyderabad: 359 km Read More 3. Manginapudi Beach, Machilipatnam 3.4 /5 Once served as a major port, Manginapudi is currently a fishing village located on the shores of a beach nearly 11 km from Machelipatnam. This beautiful natural beach near Hyderabad is unique for its black soil and also a natural bay comprising shallow water level. Distance from Hyderabad: 353 km Read More 4. Pedapatnam Beach One of the popular beaches near Hyderabad is Pedapatnam Beach. It is located in Pedapatnam village, 25km Machilipatnam in Andhra Pradesh. This beach became popular after the Telugu movie Colour Photo was shot here. Not too crowded, it is ideal for a relaxing time with family. Top Hotels In Hyderabad Search Hotels Best Resorts in Hyderabad For a perfect weekend 27 options from ₹ 2,956 onwards Best Villas in Hyderabad 6 options from ₹ 2,730 onwards Best 5-Star Hotels in Hyderabad for a Memorable Stay 34 options from ₹ 5,200 onwards Hotels Near Hyderabad Airport 28 options from ₹ 1,071 onwards Best Hotels in Hyderabad for a Perfect Getaway 50 options from ₹ 2,757 onwards Hostels In Hyderabad 13 options from ₹ 1,170 onwards View All Hotels In Hyderabad View All Hotels In Hyderabad 5. Mypadu Beach, Nellore 3.4 /5 Mypadu Beach, a mesmerising beach with pristine sea water and golden brown sand, is located on the west coast of India. It is about 25 kilometres from Nellore, Andhra Pradesh and lies on the coast of the magnificent Bay of Bengal. This beach near Hyderabad is frequented by local fishers and travellers for its fantastic view and captivating scenery although it is not as crowded as many other commercial beaches in India.  Distance from Hyderabad: 463 km Read More 6. Antarvedi Beach Antarvedi Beach near Hyderabad is known for its sunrise view and boating. Located in Antarvedi village in the East Godavari District of Andhra Pradesh, this beach is located along the Bay of Bengal. The calm waves here are ideal for swimming. There is also a 26km long trek from the beach to the nearby coastal areas. 7. Uppada Beach Uppada Beach near Hyderabad is considered as Kakinada's primary beach and has one of the longest coastlines in India. The government of Andhra Pradesh has sanctioned developmental projects for the beach in order to promote tourism. 8. Rishikonda Beach 4.1 /5 Located along the coast of the Bay of Bengal, the Rishikonda Beach is a pristine beauty in the city of Vishakhapatnam. Located in the midst of frothy blue sea and emerald greenery, this is one of the most mesmerising beaches near Hyderabad. This place is a favourite among water sports lovers. Distance from Hyderabad: 648 km Read More 9. Dolphin's nose 3.4 /5 Very similar to a dolphins nose, this 174 m high rocky headland is situated in the south of Vizag. The nose seems to be protruding out towards the Bay of Bengal giving it a rather fascinating look. Located in Vizag, this is a nearby beach from Hyderabad perfect for a weekend getaway. Distance from Hyderabad: 626 km Read More 10. Gangavaram beach 3.1 /5 One of the most beautiful beaches near Hyderabad, Gangavaram Beach is dotted with palm trees and picture-perfect sceneries attracting many films and TV shootings. This beach with soft sands and cool breeze always provides a secluded atmosphere. Distance from Hyderabad: 630 km Read More 11. Ramakrishna Beach 3.1 /5 One of the most popular beaches of Vishakapatnam, RK beach is a beach to spend some relaxed time, enjoy strolls across the beach, sunbath and more. With a number of tourist spots in and around the area, this beach near Hyderabad has something for everyone. However, it is highly advisable to not swim at this beach, as it can be very dangerous and is said to have claimed lives in the past. Distance from Hyderabad: 638 km Read More 12. Lawson's Bay Beach 3.1 /5 Lawson's Bay beach is considered an extension of Ramakrishna beach more than often. It is a calm, serene and secluded stretch with lush greenery and whitish sands. This majestic beach near Hyderabad with shallow crystal clear waters and calm waves is ideal for swimming, sunbathing and surfing. Distance from Hyderabad: 639 km Read More 13. Bheemunipatnam beach 3.1 /5 The long beautiful and pristine Bheemunipatnam Beach near Hyderabad is located at the assemblage of Gosthani River and the Bay of Bengal. It also houses the remains of a 17th-century fort and cemetery, revelling history dating back to the Dutch era. Distance from Hyderabad: 661 km Read More 14. Yarada Beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 Yarada Beach is an entrancing site that is surrounded by hills on three sides and the Bay of Bengal on the fourth, covered with lush greenery and soft golden sands all over. The beach is situated at a distance of 15 km from Visakhapatnam and does not remain very crowded. Since not many people gather here all the time, Yarada Beach near Hyderabad is by far one of the safest and cleanliest beaches in India at present. The area is covered with coconut and banana plantations. Distance from Hyderabad: 635 km Read More While the city of Hyderabad is landlocked, it is located in the Deccan Peninsula which is blessed with a vast coastline. There are numerous nearby beaches from Hyderabad each offering their own unique features for a perfect getaway.
